name: Fly Corps Aviation Savannah
about: Fly Corps Aviation, based at Savannah/Hilton Head International Airport, is dedicated to creating tomorrowâ€™s aviators. We offer a comprehensive training experience with a variety of aircraft, including Diamond DA-42s, Cessna Skyhawks, and Piper Cherokees. Our experienced instructors provide personalized training, and our location in Savannah ensures ample flying days due to the city's high number of sunny days. We support our students with funding options and a structured training program under both Part 141 and Part 61 regulations. Join us for a discovery flight over historic Downtown Savannah and Tybee Island, and let us guide you every step of the way towards achieving your pilot's license.
